body.name: Dominion 12-Cup Drip Coffee Maker, Auto Keep Warm Function, Anti-Drip System with Permanent Filter and Borosilicate Glass Carafe, One-Touch Operation, Black & Stainless

features: ☕ LARGE CAPACITY - The Dominion 12-cup drip Coffee Maker features a large capacity carafe that allows you to brew enough coffee to satisfy a gathering of friends, family, or colleagues. No more waiting for multiple rounds of brewing—serve everyone with ease and convenience.

☕ ANTI-DRIP AND NON-SLIP FEATURE - Equipped with advanced anti-drip technology, preventing any drips or leaks during the brewing process. Designed with non-slip feet, providing a secure and steady grip on any surface. Includes a reusable and removable basket filter for a a clean and hassle-free brewing experience.

☕ EASY-VIEW WATER GAUGE - Accurately measuring the water level, you can ensure the right amount of water is used for each brew, optimizing flavor extraction and delivering a perfect cup of coffee every time.

☕ DURABLE GLASS CARAFE - The Durable Glass Carafe is meticulously crafted from high-quality, heat-resistant glass, ensuring exceptional durability and withstanding daily use. Designed with a wide-grip handle and anti-drip spout for smooth and easy pouring.

☕ ONE-TOUCH OPERATION - The Coffee Maker that takes the guesswork out of brewing. With a simple touch of a button, you can start the brewing process, allowing you to focus on other tasks or simply enjoy a moment of relaxation while your coffee is prepared.
body.description: Introducing Dominion’s 12-cup drip Coffee Maker, designed to fuel your caffeine cravings and cater to your coffee-loving lifestyle. Discover the joy of brewing exceptional coffee at home. Experience the enticing aromas, bold flavors, and convenience of an excellent coffee experience right at your fingertips. Elevate your mornings and savor every sip with our exceptional coffee brewing technology. Boost your coffee routine with the 12-Cup Drip, delivering a seamless brewing experience and a perfect cup of coffee every time. Whether you're brewing for yourself or entertaining guests, this Coffee Maker is the ideal choice for reliable, flavorful, and convenient coffee enjoyment. Experience the perfect cup of coffee every morning, designed to elevate your coffee brewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This works well for brewing coffee, and the reusable filter works great. The unit itself feels cheap. The grounds basket swings in/out on what feels like a cheap hinge. The lid also limits your "target" for pouring in water as well. All in all, not enough to complain about, and I'd definitely buy again if you don't need any bells & whistles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not automatically turn off
reviews.reviewText: Good product and good value however it does not turn off after 2 hours like most modern coffee makers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for small kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Coffee pot works well. OnlyComplaint is takes a while for the coffee to get hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Except One Thing
reviews.reviewText: This coffee pot is great. Very compact, but great full size coffee maker. I my thing I wish it had was an auto-shut off after so long. If you forget to turn it off it just stays on until the next time you go to make coffee. Be aware of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my dad it broke the first day he got it so he threw it in the trash I will never purchase another coffee pot like this the latch broke when he tried to put the coffee in
